reviews.title: Very detailed information
reviews.comment: I have changed my rating due to lack of response from developers.   Please fix date difference issue!  ------------ Great app that works very well!   However, as the other reviewer noticed, my ICS phone and two other 3.1 tablets also show one day difference between the day displayed on the main calendar display and the date on the title bar of the calendar.   Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Indispensible for Chinese history and literature
reviews.comment: An extraordinary app. For anyone who enjoys reading ancient Chinese texts and studying Chinese history, the Chinsoft Lunar Calendar is indispensible. Historical dates for the past 2233 years can be converted between the modern Gregorian calendar, Chinese lunar calendar and Chinese Dynasty years. It has every deity birthday you can think of, so you can instantly know the occasion for any local temple\'s firecracker display, and the almanac aspect is a lot of fun. On top of everything else, it\'s far and away the most attractive calendar app I\'ve seen.
reviews.author: A Google User
